#summary Dans cette page vous trouverez les bases de données effectives
#labels Phase-QA

= Personnes =

  * Personne ( <u>id_personne</u>, nom, prenom )
  * Adherent ( <u>num_ad</u>, #id_pers)
  * !PersonnelAdmin ( <u>num_empl</u>, #id_pers, affectation)
  * !PersonnelSportif ( <u>num_empl</u>, #id_pers, type_prof)

= Matériel = 

  * !MaterielVente( <u>reference</u>, quantite, description, prix_base)
  * !MaterielLocation ( <u>num_mat</u>, reference, date_achat, etat, prix_base)
  * Location ( <u>date_loc</u>, <u>#num_mat</u>, <u>#id_pers</u>, prix_paye)
  * Vente ( <u>#type</u>, <u>#id_pers</u>, <u>date_vente</u>, quantite, prix_reel)

= Casiers =

  * Casier ( <u>num_cas</u> )
  * !ReservationAnnee ( <u>#num</u>, <u>#num_ad</u>, <u>annee</u> )
  * !ReservationSeance ( <u>#num</u>, #id_pers, <u>creneau</u>, prix_paye)

= Forfaits =

  * Forfait ( <u>type_for</u>, prix_base )
  * Souscrit ( <u>#type_for</u>, <u>#num_ad</u>, <u>date_deb</u>, date_fin )

= Terrains Squash =

  * !TerrainSquash ( <u>num_ter</u> )
  * !ReservationTerrain ( <u>#num_ter</u>, <u>date_deb</u>, date_fin, #id_pers, prix_paye)

= Cours Squash =

  * !CoursSquash ( <u>id_cours</u>, #id_prof, type) //type = indiv ou collectif
  * !CoursSquashIndiv ( <u>#id_cours</u>, #num_ad)
  * !CoursSquashCollectif ( <u>#id_cours</u>, nb_personne ) 
  * !InscriptionCoursSquashColl ( <u>#id_cours</u>, <u>#num_ad</u> )
  * !CreneauCoursSquash ( #id_cours, <u>#id_ter</u>, <u>date_deb</u>, date_fin )

= Gym =

  * !SalleGym ( <u>id_salle</u>, capacite)
  * !CoursGym ( <u>type_cours</u>, #id_prof )
  * !CreneauGym ( <u>#id_salle</u>, <u>#type_cours</u>, <u>jour</u>, <u>heure</u> )
